thread.title: Germany’s Aljona Savchenko and Bruno Massot Win Pairs Skating Gold

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Germany’s Aljona Savchenko and Bruno Massot Win Pairs Skating Gold
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—Aljona Savchenko and Bruno Massot of Germany took pairs skating gold here in a closely fought four-way contest with pairs from China, Canada, and Olympic Athletes from Russia.
Savchenko and Massot came back from a mistake by him on side by side jumps in the short program to set a new record for a free skate performed to “La Terre vue du ciel” by Armand Amar, with elements including a rafter-high triple twist lift, secure triple throw jumps and two clean sets of side by side jumps.
